data.meta_description: Fulbright Stories Stories of Fulbrighters promoting international understanding and mutual respect since 1946. data.text:
The Fulbright Association is the U.S. alumni organization for the Fulbright Program. Our mission is to continue and extend the Fulbright tradition of education, advocacy and service.

The Fulbright Association is a 501(c)(3) under federal tax guidelines.

EIN: 52-1821935
